definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 總結了112例腦卒中患者吞嚥障礙的康復護理體會。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結兒童皮膚脈管異常的臨牀特點和治療選擇。

sentences.english: He handed in a summary of the civil engineering project to the higher authorities.
sentences.chinese: 年底，他向上級交上了一份土建工程的總結。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes and summarizes the quality common faults in sinking well construction.
sentences.chinese: 本文就沉井施工中的質量通病進行了分析和總結。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo summarize the experience of diagnosis and treatment of true hermaphroditism.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結對真兩性畸形的診斷和治療經驗。

sentences.english: The following figures summarise the different models that can be invoked .
sentences.chinese: 下圖總結了可調用的不同模型。

sentences.english: An overview was made to the basic theory on the system simulation of vapor-compression refrigeration plants.
sentences.chinese: 針對蒸氣壓縮式製冷裝置仿真的基本理論進行了總結。

sentences.english: Feeling the stones across the river, learning by doing while summing up.
sentences.chinese: “摸著石頭過河，邊幹邊學邊總結”。

sentences.english: A very good summary of the Tylenol case.
sentences.chinese: 這是對Tylenol案例的很好的總結。

sentences.english: For example, the statement “Men are taller than women” is an empirical generalization.
sentences.chinese: 比如“男人比女人高”這句話是一個經驗總結。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of total gastrectomy for gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析和總結胃癌全胃切除術治療經驗。

sentences.english: The next step is to harvest the selected classes from the auto-generated class diagram.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的一步是從自動生產類圖中總結選擇的類。

sentences.english: It summarizes the famous doctors experience, and promotes traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 總結名醫經驗，弘揚祖國醫學。

sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結評估手術治療肱骨髁間骨折的療效。
對名詞性物主代詞進行總結。

sentences.english: Objective To review the surgical treatment of 681 infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結681例嬰幼兒先天性心臟病外科治療經驗。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
